message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV

The paper deals with text classification using linear classifiers and embeddings, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses optimization techniques and dimensionality reduction, which are common topics in machine learning and optimization, respectively. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with text classification, which is a common task in information retrieval (IR), making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category as well.
